                          |
                          +--grendel.widgets.MenuBarCtrl
public class MenuBarCtrl
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
implements Control

This is a menubar with a keyed lookup rather than a flat iteration model which JMenuBar by default uses.

See Also:
Serialized Form
